name: Total Recall
overrideDescription: Return [effect0.power] random spell cards from the discard pile to your hand and apply [consume].
cardLoreTooltips: The Wurmkin claim they contain the History of the World in their stoneform â€” the knowledge of demons and Titans alike that can be granted and returned at will. I thought my notes to be a near-total collection of information on this Realm, but the Wurmkin appear to know of things that they have no right knowing. Things that, once long ago, I may have known myself...
